default: 150g/5½oz fresh pasta, cooked according to packet instructions
75g/2¾oz cooked mussels from a jar, rinsed and drained

steps: Place the white wine, double cream and turmeric into a pan over a medium heat. Bring up to the boil then reduce the heat to simmer for three minutes.
Add the cooked pasta and mussels and cook for a further three minutes, until the mussels are warmed through.
To serve, pour into a bowl and top with the chopped chives.
title: Creamy pasta with mussels
